msgs.text: What is Stratum V2 and what does it fix?

Stratum V2 is a new protocol for mining pools which addresses things like
- Empty blocks
- Pools being able to censor
- Hashrate stealing
and adds
- Header only mining
- Better protocol that has new features
- Lower internet bandwidth required

The Stratum protocol update idea defines how miners, proxies, and pool communicate to contribute hashrate to the Bitcoin network.
